seo.ogDescription: The terms for using this website.

header.heading: Terms of Service
header.description: These terms apply to the use of this website.

sections.title: Using this website
paragraphs: You may use this website to learn about our services and to contact us for enquiries and quotes.
Please do not misuse the website or attempt to interfere with its normal operation.

sections.title: Information and quotes
paragraphs: We aim to keep the information on this website accurate and up to date. However, it may change over time.
Any estimates or guidance are indicative only until we’ve confirmed details and provided a written quote.

sections.title: Third-party links
paragraphs: This website may link to third-party services (for example: maps or social profiles). We’re not responsible for the content or policies of third-party websites.

sections.title: Changes to these terms
paragraphs: We may update these terms from time to time. When we do, we’ll update the “Last updated” date on this page.

sections.title: Contact
paragraphs: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us using the details below.
